Name: Apicurio
Text: Where have I gone off to? This area seems pretty rural for the home of a great wizard...

Name: Some guy
Text: Who going? What you do? Get!

Name: Apicurio
Text: Oh hello, I'm looking for a wizard by the name of the Great Hillbeetle!

Name: Apicurio
Text: You wouldn't know who that is, would you?

Name: Some guy
Text: Maybe maybe. Who it? Why you try a know?

Name: Apicurio
Text: Well, the Hillbeetle has been accused by the High Queen of using their magic irresponsibly. I've been sent in to clean up their act!

Name: Some jerk
Text: Ah, I watch. You attempt get to fresh! Whisk away great journey of sweat!

Name: Hillbeetle
Text: Yes, watched your ego well. Make pains for this great crop! I Hillbeetle! Great of magic wizard!

Name: Apicurio
Text: Oof. In hindsight this was painfully obvious, considering the context, the battle screen setting...

Name: Hillbeetle
Text: Hush-hush, sneak! I bury you deep! Fertilizer for my onion! Take this! Dirt fling!

Name: Apicurio
Text: Oh stop it, you're gonna fill up my pollen baskets! Fine. Time to do my job!
